org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.piterman

Class PitermanConstruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractControllableAlgorithm
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditableAlgorithm
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.AbstractComplementConstruction<FSA,FSA>
            • org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.piterman.PitermanConstruction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, ComplementConstruction<FSA,FSA>, ControllableAlgorithm, EditableAlgorithm

    public class PitermanConstruction
extends AbstractComplementConstruction<FSA,FSA>
    A PitermanComplement object complements an NBW A in stages:
    1. Determinizes the input NBW as a DPW P by the Safra-Piterman construction.
    2. Complements P as another DPW P' by increasing the parity of every state by 1.
    3. Converts P' to an NBW A'.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String O_HISTORY_TREE
      The option of using Schewe's history trees instead of Safra trees.
      static java.lang.String O_MAX_ACC
      The option of maximizing the Büchi acceptance set of the input NBW before complementation.
      static java.lang.String O_MERGE_EQUIVALENT_STATES
      The option of merging equivalent states in the conversion from the complement DPW to the complement NBW.
      static java.lang.String O_PARITY_CONDITION_OPT
      The option of simplifying the parity condition based on Rabin index.
      static java.lang.String O_REDUCE_STATES
      The option of reducing unreachable and dead states from the complement NBW.
      static java.lang.String O_REDUCE_TRANSITIONS
      The option of reducing transitions.
      static java.lang.String O_SIMULATION_OPT
      The option of simplifying the complement DPW based on simulation relations.
